thread.title: Join us October 22 for the next 50 on Fire Meetup
thread.title_full: Join us October 22 for the next 50 on Fire Meetup

author: Tricia Dunn
title: Join us October 22 for the next 50 on Fire Meetup
text:
SHARE Join us October 22 for the next 50 on Fire Meetup As one of our savvy readers you already know that 50 on Fire, the hottest year-end awards celebration recognizing the city s inventors, TO SEND ANOTHER EMAIL CLOSE share 
As one of our savvy readers you already know that 50 on Fire , the hottest year-end awards celebration recognizing the cityâ€™s inventors, disrupters and newsmakers is back on December 3, 2015. You may already have even nominated the game-changers in your life (if not--don't wait--nominations close next Thursday, October 8) and purchased your Early Bird ticket to the main event. 
Now, we invite you join us at our second 50 on Fire official meetup at One Greenway . These gatherings bring together nominees, judges and other industry leaders for a night of networking and celebrating Boston's innovation scene.
